thread.title: Weekend Jaunt
thread.title_full: Weekend Jaunt - Review of Washington Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sophieseamus
title: Weekend Jaunt
text: We had a fantastic time at the Washington Square Hotel. The rooms were perfect, with a lot of character. The staff were so hospitable and always smiling, especially the doorman! Everyone was very accommodating and helpful. We had both the continental breakfast and a full breakfast in their restaurant. Both were delicious. I would highly recommend this hotel!
